page.title: 03Facilities - Bartley Middle
page.content: {Bartley Middle School}supports a teaching staff of 11.5, including a Science and a Music specialist. It has excellent facilities inherited from when it was a secondary school. It boasts a purpose built Music Room, Domestic Science/Sewing Roomand a non fiction Library. The Swimming Pool, which is 4/5 feet deep at the deep end, is used only between June and September because of the Crippling Heating bills. The Playing Field attached to the school is several acres in size, allowing two football pitches, a cricket square, long and high jump pits, Shott Putt, Javelin and Discus. The hard surface playground has space for four tennis courts. The school boasts its own gymnasium which is well equipped with both wall bars, horses and bucks.
